Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Immunosenescence: Immunity in the Young and Aged
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Immunosenescence: Immunity in the Young and Aged
Configuration.Description: The study sequenced TCRB gene rearrangements from young versus elderly human subjects.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Inclusion:

  • Healthy apheresis platelet donors
  • Aged 20-35 years, or 70-85 years

Exclusion:

  • History of autoimmune disease
  • History of diabetes mellitus
  • History of chemotherapy

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
